LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisonCap.label: Garrison Cap
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisonCap.description: A soft cap for servicemen for the times when a helmet is not required or available.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisonCoat.label: Garrison Coat
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_GarrisonCoat.description: A typical coat for an enlisted man, designed to keep one warm in chilly weather.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_HazardSuit.label: Hazard Suit
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_HazardSuit.description: A hazardous material suit covering the wearer's entire body. Used for protection against hazardous biological and chemical agents.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_PowerSkeleton.label: Powered Exoskeletal Unit
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_PowerSkeleton.description: A powered exoskeletal suit which mimics the human form and can be worn by an untrained operator. It significantly increases the wearer's strength and running speed.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_UnitSuit.label: Uniform
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_UnitSuit.description: A jumpsuit for colonization fleet crew members and standard basic infantrymen.
